quotes:
People are not pure functions; they have all sorts of interesting side effects.
- Sarah Drasner

Drawing is the honesty of the art. There is no possibility of cheating. It is either good or bad.
- Salvador Dali

Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
- Steve Jobs

I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
- Albert Einstein

"It's about a society in a free fall. On the way down it keeps telling itself so far so good, so far so good, so far so good. But it's not about how you fall, it's about how you land."
- La Haine

The problem with citations on the internet is that you can never be sure they are authentic.
- Abraham Lincoln
